attributes.action: STOP the release of all Balloons , Chinese Lanterns at Roadside Memorials etc
attributes.additional_details: Facebook is showing pictures all the time of dead animals and wildlife due to plastic and litter being disposed of anywhere people choose to throw it.   DON'T SLING IT...... BIN IT !
attributes.background: 'Do it for David' campaign to stop Plastic and metal bits from landing in fields and killing unsuspecting animals that eat them or ending up in the oceans of the world, killing Marine Life etc. Farm animals,Wildlife and Marine life are eating them and dying all the time.
